name: Mazdun
description:
Can you escape 15 levels of the Mazdun dungeon?

It may not look like much but give it a try!

Mazdun is an experimental, low-rez game made as an entry for #LOWREZJAM 2018. It is an attempt to make a game with meaningful gameplay at 3x3 resolution(scaled up so you can see it).

W,A,S,D to move your character.
R to reset the level if you get stuck.
M to toggle the music.
